Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."NMC_CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_UPD_SP" ( P_TABLE_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_PK_ID IN INTEGER, P_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_LANGUAGE_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_UPDATED_BY IN INTEGER, P_ATTRIBUTE1 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL ) IS V_COUNT NUMBER; BEGIN /* Check whether row exists before updating it */ SELECT COUNT (*) INTO V_COUNT FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = P_TABLE_NAME AND PK_ID = P_PK_ID AND LANGUAGE_CODE = P_LANGUAGE_CODE; IF (V_COUNT > 0) /* row exists */ THEN UPDATE CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS SET NAME = P_NAME, DESCRIPTION = P_DESCRIPTION, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY = P_UPDATED_BY, ATTRIBUTE1 = P_ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2 = P_ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3 = P_ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4 = P_ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5 = P_ATTRIBUTE5 WHERE TABLE_NAME = P_TABLE_NAME AND PK_ID = P_PK_ID AND LANGUAGE_CODE = P_LANGUAGE_CODE; END IF; END;
